OK, I'll try - thanks for your help.

I had encountered that problem before in linux. You may try to reinstall bazel using apt-get and do it again. It will work, but patience is needed.

body:
Patience?  Oh dear, then I'm really in trouble.

OK, I'll try - thanks for your help.

On Wed, 2017-02-22 at 03:02 -0800, cjliux wrote:

I had encountered that problem before in linux. You may try to reinstall bazel using apt-get and do it again. It will work, but patience is needed.

—
